text:
ncc-samplewapt-001 pre-authentication sql injection in dologin 
 critical high high ncc-samplewapt-001 reported

ncc-samplewapt-002 users can become other users via manipulated jwt 
 high risk: an attacker can create a valid jwt for any other user by sending a jwt containing a modified username to the https://acmeorders.[examplecorp].com/api/token endpoint. critical impact:  an attacker can act as any other user. high ncc-samplewapt-002 reported

ncc-samplewapt-014 account takeover via sms password reset  
 critical high high ncc-samplewapt-014 new

ncc-samplewapt-003 users can change arbitrary user's password via updatepassword  
 high high high ncc-samplewapt-003 new

ncc-samplewapt-004 arbitrary file read in example files object 
 high an attacker can read arbitrary files on the server including source code and configuration files. high exploitability ncc-samplewapt-004 reported

ncc-samplewapt-007 design pattern creates risk of server-side request forgery (ssrf) 
 high high undetermined ncc-samplewapt-007 reported

ncc-samplewapt-011 application returns incorrect content-type for json responses 
 high high high ncc-samplewapt-011 new

ncc-samplewapt-013 s3 buckets misconfigured 
 high high high ncc-samplewapt-013 new

ncc-samplewapt-006 application uses weak hash to store passwords 
 medium medium medium ncc-samplewapt-006 reported

ncc-samplewapt-012 iam passrole permission allows potential authorization bypass 
 medium high low ncc-samplewapt-012 new status

ncc-samplewapt-008 verbose error messages disclose sensitive information 
 low low medium ncc-samplewapt-008 reported

ncc-samplewapt-010 potential backdoor user 
 low medium low ncc-samplewapt-010 reported

ncc-samplewapt-009 multiple complex authentication methods 
 informational undetermined undetermined ncc-samplewapt-009 reported
